column4: Is something wrong with the us repositories some pkgs can't be downloaded?
just pulled a bunch of stuff no problems
if you apt-cache search w32codecs does it return with the package?
what is the exact command for that?
Package w32codecs is not available, but is referred to by another package.
This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or
is only available from another source
E: Package w32codecs has no installation candidate
do 'sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list' goto http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/366732 copy and paste to your sources.list save over any existing text
